offence_date.source: In the evening of 2 April 2022, during an anti-narcotics operation... (Summary of Facts)

offence_time.source: At around 9:20pm, a male and a female appeared on the 21st floor and rang the doorbell of flat 2110

place_of_offence.address: Room 2110 (flat 2110), 21st floor, Hoi Yan House, Hoi Fu Court, No.2 Hoi Ting Road, Tai Kok Tsui, Kowloon
place_of_offence.source: Particulars of the offence ... at room 2110, 21st floor, Hoi Yan House, Hoi Fu Court, No.2 Hoi Ting Road, Tai Kok Tsui, Kowloon

cross_border.source: No cross-border activity mentioned in the judgment

trafficking_mode.source: Paraphernalia and packaging found in the flat, visits by others to the flat, and the judge's description of the premises as an active centre for distribution, packaging and consumption

reasons_for_offence.source: The defendant was a former drug abuser; the defendant claimed the drugs were for his own consumption and would sometimes share them with his friends
The defendant admitted he would sometimes share drugs with his friends

benefits_received.source: The sentencing record gives a street value for the drugs (HK$9,895.60 and HK$2,621) but does not state any money was received by the defendant for trafficking
